replies.body:
{{champion:268}} 

Remember this post:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/x3sI7f6d-bug-report-azirs-w-bug-on-towers-no-cooldown

So all you who were absolutly certain that Azir always had no CD on W when attacking turrets and told me how wrong I was when saying it was a bug, do you feel silly now?
logged in to upvote
They finally nerfed my main {{champion:80}} :C ah well i'm still gonna rek people

Think of it this way, the more your main gets nerfed, the less people play him, which means he will get banned less, mirror lanes less, people won't be as used to playing against him, so you can surprise them easier. But he is your main and you're so used to playing him that regardless of nerfs you will still do well (like you say) so in actuallity it's a nerf to pantheon, but a buff to you. :)
That is a good way to think about it.
Maining Azir rubs off on you :p
That is a positive view of it

Hey Riot, I'm here cause im pretty concerned about my games that are twisting about. Right now at this moment my MMR would have dropped significantly. I have many losses now, not one win since 6 games and there will always be either one or two people on my team who will not comply to a simple request by the team and I know for a fact that this will not happen in many of my other games leading to an easy game or a close win. I know that how I play is how I play every game and that i HAD a 65%-70% winrate for every support game I played but my games seems to have those really low mmr players. What im  trying to ask is, could u check whether it is honestly just me and that im doing something wrong or either the system has lowered my mmr dramatically to the lower rating/lower rated players.
Thx Riot
 
Yours Sincerely, Lhuka
Yea upvote, I'm srsly questioning some of the players in my match up.
Agreeded. I went up to a 65-80% at one point, then I got a whole lot of people afking and feeding. Now my winrate has gone down and I can't get out of low ELO hell.

It is just a matter of you having the same MMR as them, It is a new season so they might have just won tons of games in their provisional's and maybe wern't dropped to their appropriate rank. Easiest way to solve it is just winning because the more your win the higher your MMR will be so you will stop being patched with lower ranked players 'idiots' OR, it is because your loss rate is low so you are being matched with what Riot thinks you are. The system has bugs but they are not easily fixed and might not be fixed for years to come so you just put up with it and try to climb ranks.

winning what exactly,Norms or Ranked. Come on, you thats what is stopping us from winning in ranked games

As u said easier if ur WINNING but its those ppl stopping us from doing all these things to help ourselves climb
Jarvan + AoE ult = Full ad Jarven one shots adc, support and mage :3
If adc, support and mage all bunch up against an all AD J4 then they deserve to get 1 shotted and lose. Positioning is important for all 3 of those type of players so I don't see it as a problem.
agreed!
Finally, a decent leblanc skin (Not including  Raveborn Leblanc)
I neeeeeed to play Kha again, that skin looks so good. The LB skin looks great, but Im not excited for more LB's in the mid lane.
More LB's! MORE RAVEN! MORE THIS SKIN! MOAR!

Yea that kha skin is awesome!!! Unfortunately it will be like guardian of the sands Kha where I feel bad upgrading his R because on both skins it's not as nice as the normal mode... But oh well it's still badass!

I agree with the lb statement too... I may have to stop going mid lane for a bit (a good opportunity to play kha tho I suppose)

I second that notion, however, I would love it if people stop playing LB top lane. Even with MR runes, I couldn't get anywhere near her on the top lane. From lvl 1-3 it is fine, but when she gets the combos in, with either thunderlord or warlords, I couldn't farm at all.
Any word on the Hextech system's live release?
have clubs not been released on oce?
Oce always gets everything last so probs not
REKT
We patch first, so that is just not true.
Lolol and here we are without even a hint as to when we might be getting Hextech chests. "we patch first" ok buddy
As of last year we get patches first.

Hey Boba,

Clubs will come out this patch, although the feature won't be turned on immediately. In the days following the 6.5 release we will roll them out across all regions (including OCE).

In my opinion I have to admit I preferred having harder leveling since it was more joyful leveling up. Now everyone one will level up much faster and not as much practice and patience would've gone into the game.  This is just my opinion so please don't get offended.

People can always practice at level 30. Normals has its own MMR system (think of it as old ranked elo system but you can't see your elo). You can always practice in normals, and you should always be versing people around your skill level. I like the change, gives newbies the chance to get into ranked quicker and helps smurfs to not give up on leveling
Yeah I suppose
Half the exp for new accounts to be made to get to lvl 30 more like a sht ton more smurfs coming out
Yep

Either u don't know ppl or u r as stupid as ur post implies. AS soon as they hit lvl 30, they will try to get to challenger even without proper runes and masteries and that sir, affects us who had to play tons of games to lvl up. This is just my opinion and u have every right to get offended since I meant it to be offensive.
Maybe just maybe son, Teemo will get his skin fixed...
no... just, no.
whens hextech annie comming. She looks cool

I have a question, I recently came back to league of legends after 2 years so I ended up forgetting my old account and I'm currently Lv. 24 if they're making it easier to level to 30 would my exp reaching to lv. 24 increase my levels in any way? OR would it stay the same?

Within this Patch I noticed that the Client has been lagging a little bit and when I solo Queue nothing is wrong until I go into a group Queue and it just starts to crash on its own and I don't seem to understand why it is doing it this patch. It never happened ever until 6.5 so  please let me know as to why this is happening, thanks.
Im in love with the urgot buff xD it will help him be able to not die instantly after ulting love it

I think it'll be great for him and his ult will be used strategically now, as in urgots may situate themselves close to the enemy (like melee range) and then ult them causing to get the 1.5sec fear on them causing urgot to do a mass amount of damage onto them but i dunno if it will fear the champion or not, i hope so!
i tried this and if your close enough like flash in and ult in the center of there team the targeted one seemed to be feared as well works great

hey guys to those who play rengar......... is anyone else getting like a glitchy moment when you use 5 ferocity Q and cannot hit minions/ champions for like a 1 sec ? it happens to me often ever since the update but wasnt sure so i thought i might ask my friends online :)

Hey guys, for the total Exp being halved on new accounts. Does your current account under lvl 30 have the total xp halved?????
Really curious, that's all.

Thx guys.
no, you should be closer to lvl 30 now, unless riot did something wierd

So, The fact you have discounted runes (not by half so sounds useless) is a  start.

What about lowering the price ladder for Champs? it seems ridiculous that the IP wont match from old level 30 to new level 30.
it would benefit all players. 

Lets hope this is considered.
Yes I agree, it would take less time for people to get to lvl 30 but a hell of a long time for people to buy high priced champions just after they r lvl 30
Yes I agree, it would take less time for people to get to lvl 30 but a hell of a long time for people to buy high priced champions just after they r lvl 30
A little annoyed about the "Total experience required to reach summoner level 30 reduced by half" thing... :( oh well

Why the removal of Soraka's heal to minions?

If you don't want healing to be a thing in the game (eg. gimped heals on taric and alistar) just don't make a healer. 

The balance team is mind boggling, not just the Soraka changes but pretty much all of the changes as well as the problematic things they're not changing.

The changes to account leveling are great though. Now I can get my smurfs up faster, however making it so they remain the same level regardless of the XP put in is a little odd.
